column2: [[1961]]) is a [[New Zealand]]-born Academy Award-winning director. He directed [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' trilogy]] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' trilogy]].
